sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
paragraphs: By accessing and using LootQuest, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.
If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

sections.title: 2. Use License
paragraphs: Permission is granted to temporarily access and use LootQuest for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.
This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions.

sections.title: 3. User Accounts
paragraphs: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
You must be at least 13 years old to use this service.
One account per user. Multiple accounts are strictly prohibited and may result in permanent ban.

sections.title: 4. Earning Points
paragraphs: Points are earned by completing offers, surveys, and tasks from our partners.
LootQuest reserves the right to adjust point values at any time.
Fraudulent activity will result in immediate account termination and forfeiture of all points.
⚠️ WARNING: VPN usage, bots, or multiple accounts will result in permanent ban without refund.

sections.title: 5. Withdrawals
paragraphs: Users must wait 7 days after their first earning before making a withdrawal.
Minimum withdrawal amounts vary by reward type.
LootQuest reserves the right to review and verify withdrawals before processing.

sections.title: 6. Disclaimer
paragraphs: LootQuest is not affiliated with Roblox Corporation, Epic Games, or any other game publisher.
All trademarks are property of their respective owners.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
paragraphs: We collect information you provide directly: email, display name, and account preferences.
Automatically collected: IP address, browser type, device information, and usage data.
From third parties: OAuth profile data from Google or Discord when you sign in.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
paragraphs: To provide and maintain our service.
To process your transactions and withdrawals.
To detect and prevent fraud.
To communicate with you about your account and updates.

sections.title: 3. Data Protection
paragraphs: We use industry-standard encryption (SSL/TLS) to protect data in transit.
Your password is hashed and never stored in plain text.
We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

sections.title: 4. Cookies
paragraphs: We use cookies for session management and to remember your preferences.
You can disable cookies in your browser, but some features may not work properly.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
paragraphs: You may request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal data.
Contact us at support@loot-quest.fr for data requests.

sections.title: 1. What Are Cookies
paragraphs: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website.
They help us provide a better user experience by remembering your preferences.

sections.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
paragraphs: Essential Cookies: Required for the website to function (authentication, security).
Preference Cookies: Remember your language and display preferences.
Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site.

sections.title: 3. Managing Cookies
paragraphs: Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings.
Disabling cookies may affect your ability to use certain features of our site.

sections.title: How do I earn points?
paragraphs: Complete offers, surveys, and app downloads from our Offer Wall.
Each task shows its point value before you start.
Points are credited automatically once the offer provider confirms completion.

sections.title: How long until I receive my points?
paragraphs: Most offers credit within minutes to 24 hours.
Some offers may take up to 7 days depending on the advertiser.
If points are missing, contact support with your offer details.

sections.title: When can I withdraw?
paragraphs: New users must wait 7 days after their first earning to withdraw.
This helps us prevent fraud and ensures a fair platform for everyone.

sections.title: What rewards are available?
paragraphs: Roblox Robux (instant delivery via game server)
Fortnite V-Bucks (gift card codes)
PayPal Cash (direct transfer)
More rewards coming soon!

sections.title: Is LootQuest safe and legit?
paragraphs: Yes! LootQuest is a legitimate GPT (Get-Paid-To) platform.
We partner with trusted offer providers like Lootably.
Your data is protected with industry-standard encryption.

sections.title: I have a problem. How do I get help?
paragraphs: Click Contact Us in the footer to submit a support ticket.
Join our Discord community for faster responses.
Include as much detail as possible about your issue.
